original_title: The Warwick Rowers - Long Hot Summer Part 2 - Spain
overview: The Spain film sees the team continuing their summer in the exotic surroundings of Andalucia in southern Spain. They spend a day at a fabulous villa overlooking Spainâ€™s most glamorous resort, Marbella, then head off to the Atlantic beaches near trendy Tarifa.
